Articles.Content: I was just wondering if there is a way to combine two different save files.
Not quite sure what you mean, are you saying combining your builds into one file, or are you trying to combine different flights in progress into one save file?
I would have no idea how to do that. I assume you would have to do some fancy persistance file editing, but moving builds is much easier.

You can, it is just pretty annoying to do...

I accidentally made my first space station in a second save, and have been testing to move it to my current save...

Still working out how to do it (there are quite a few things you have to change on the craft)
